notes.text: After testing some fun decks in Legend rank during the first three weeks of March ranked season, I finally found time to go serious and let the girls out. Went 23-2 from L1, where my only two losses were my first two KoG promo matches, where I draw all ritual monsters in the first turns without a single searcher or ritual spell. Two Gishki Chains did some pretty good work, whereas AMA was the real MVP, as most people on the ladder don't play around it anymore.
